item.title: Software
item.description: C++ vinecopulib: A C++ library for vine copulas RcppThread: R-friendly threading in C++ R rvinecopulib: R interface to the vinecopulib C++ library VineCopula: Statistical inference of vine copulas kdecopula: Kernel smoothing for bivariate copula densities kdevine: Multivariate kernel density estimation with vine copulas vinereg: D-vine copula quantile regression cctols: Tools for continuous convolution in nonparametric estimation jdify: Joint density classifiers gamCopula: Generalized additive models for bivariate conditional dependence structures and vine copulas
